          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_time": 1551949706307,
          "id": "ab3ffd03-58ad-4ef0-a858-93e9467e1245",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_time": 1551949706307,
          "parent_id": "3ef66d67-caeb-4127-a804-a0c2068560fd",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [
              [
                "Plain Text"
              ]
            ],
            "title": [
              [
                "\u003c!doctype html\u003e\n\u003chtml\u003e\n\u003chead\u003e\n\u003cstyle\u003e\n    body{ background-color:white; }\n    #canvas{border:1px solid red; }\n\u003c/style\u003e\n\u003cscript\u003e\nwindow.onload=(function(){\n\n    // canvas related variables\n    var canvas=document.getElementById(\"canvas\");\n    var ctx=canvas.getContext(\"2d\");\n\n    // fill using a pattern\n    var patternImage=new Image();\n    // IMPORTANT! \n    // Always use .onload to be sure the image has\n    //     fully loaded before using it in .createPattern\n    patternImage.onload=function(){\n        // create a pattern object\n        var pattern = ctx.createPattern(patternImage,'repeat');\n        // set the fillstyle to that pattern\n        ctx.fillStyle=pattern;\n        // fill a rectangle with the pattern\n        ctx.fillRect(50,50,150,100);\n        // demo only, stroke the rect for clarity\n        ctx.strokeRect(50,50,150,100);\n    }\n    patternImage.src='http://i.stack.imgur.com/K9EZl.png';\n\n}); // end window.onload\n\u003c/script\u003e\n\u003c/head\u003e\n\u003cbody\u003e\n    \u003ccanvas id=\"canvas\" width=325 height=250\u003e\u003c/canvas\u003e\n\u003c/body\u003e\n\u003c/html\u003e"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
